member.name: MIB_TCP6TABLE_OWNER_PID
member.summary: The MIB_TCP6TABLE_OWNER_PID structure contains a table of process IDs (PIDs) and the IPv6 TCP links that are context bound to these PIDs.

member.name: MIB_TCP6TABLE_OWNER_PID.dwNumEntries
member.summary: The number of elements in the table.

member.name: MIB_TCP6TABLE_OWNER_PID.table
member.summary: Array of structures returned by a call to .
